snippet: Teachers at Fairfield University leave the classroom for a little drama and a lesson in business and philosophy: a staging of “Glengarry Glen Ross.”
abstract: Faculty members fill most of the principal roles in a Fairfield University production of David Mamet's play Glengarry Glen Ross; directed by Alistair Highet, the show is part of the syllabus for a dozen classes in business, economics, philosophy, communications and politics.
lead_paragraph: Teachers at Fairfield University leave the classroom for a little drama and a lesson in business and philosophy: a staging of “Glengarry Glen Ross.”

headline.seo: ‘Glengarry Glen Ross’ at Fairfield, as a Classroom Text
headline.main: Hey, That’s My Professor Cursing on the Stage
headline.print_headline: Hey, That’s My Professor Cursing on the Stage
